longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of France must be valid for the period of intended
  stay. 
- Nationals of France are allowed to enter with expired (max.
  5 years) National ID Cards issued  
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of France.
  However, passport is required when accompanied by minors who
  do not have their own travel documents. 
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of France.
  However, passport is required when accompanied by minors who
  do not have their own travel documents.

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- All minors who are nationals of France are expected to hold
  their own travel document.
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of France will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay as follows:
  - at least EUR 100.- per day of stay; or
  - at least EUR 50.- per day of stay if holding a confirmed
  invitation or a tourist voucher
